author: Rutul Parikh
comment: Simply great! Nice selection of wallpapers, new ones are added quietly and they change appearance with the time of the day! A must have if you like stock Android experience and material design.

author: HARSHVARDHAN SRIVASTAVA
comment: Really great wallpaper application... Simple and crisp wallpapers all the way.

author: D K
comment: Stunning wallpapers. Love the fact they change throughout the day.

author: Dan Summerell
comment: The wallpapers look so sleek and stylish. I love them.

author: Daniel McAleese
comment: Truly beautiful application. Simple concept, executed perfectly.

author: LeNgineer _
comment: It pretty cool but the production is a bit low

author: Squishy Fish
comment: Very simple, such minimalistic , much love

author: Soheil P
comment: great app. I wanted to give it 4 stars because i really like to see sth moving ( be alive ) but there isn't. for example it would be better if the water under the 7 picture from left to move slowly. the idea of this app is perfect but needs some more development. I gave it 5 stars to give u guys some satisfaction and motivation

author: Tridip R. Hazarika
comment: Was a bit disappointed when I found that it still uses 80mb of RAM. But it's not battery-draining like other live wp apps, the wallpapers are brilliant as well as relaxing and everything's available for free!  Thanks to Jenny Hanell for such an amazing and relaxing live wp app which is light on both the battery and RAM!

author: Thomas Bodrey
comment: Love the app, but I would like the option to use the old versions of the islands instead of the new redesigned version. For instance, I like the volcano with big ash cloud instead of small one, and the original sun (the new one just doesn't feel right to me, idk why...). To understand how big this is, let me say that you that you're tampering with somebody's wallpaper. If you're going to release an update that does that, even minor changes, give the option to switch between new and old. Maybe the new versions of the other islands look better than the others, it depends on the user looking at them. Nevertheless they are still great, as always.   Btw, on your donations section of the support tab, not even if you go to Burger King, 99¢+tax is NOT buying you a coffee, you might need a buck 50. Hehe. Donors beware of this tax, idk if that's the app or Google but it charges $1.03.

reply.author: Jenny Hanell
reply.content: Thanks for your nice review. I'm sorry that you didn't like the new versions of the backgrounds! If more people complain about the them I may concider to implement a function to use older versions, but I prefer to keep the app as simple as possible (both in terms of size and functions). We'll have to wait and see. Anyway thanks for the feedback! 😊

author: Vishwa Mohan
comment: Amazing and interesting app. No pressure on the phone or you with set it and forget it method. But would love it if you could add various other places (like wonders of the world) and add one moving object that changes every hour (like the sun, clouds or small animals). Kudos

author: Parkinson Sniper
comment: It is too simple. Like you can create it on MS Paint. There is no motion. It changes just 4 times a day. They are nice calm designs, but I expected a little motion or a little more change during the day. Still, good work 👊

author: Caedmon Akers
comment: Great app!! Super cute but also sophisticated material designs that change with the time of day. However I have a suggestion: the island changing with the weather in real life would be amazing! Hope this app continues to grow, and thanks for a free, no ads experience :)

reply.author: Jenny Hanell
reply.content: We're working on it 😎🌦️ Thanks for your review!

author: Rashmit Valvi
comment: It said live wallpapers, I don't see any. False description earned you a few thousand downloads. Even zombies are more alive than your wallpapers.

reply.author: Jenny Hanell
reply.content: Sorry to hear that, I thought the description text made it clear that there are no superfluous animations in this app. However, it does change 4 times a day (between morning/noon/evening/night) according to your preferred timespan.

author: Vukašin Kosanović
comment: You could add more times of the day, so more wallpapers are changed during the day and maybe integration with some weather app for rain or snow effects..

author: Sam Wagner
comment: Great wallpapers, unlike lots of other live wallpapers this has essentially no impact on battery life. The backgrounds themselves are wonderful, been using this for over a year now and can't imagine anything else

author: Reed Williams
comment: Liked the old sun colors better than the new pastels, but it's still a great app. Maybe release a classic colors pack?

author: Samuel Palmer
comment: Great wallpaper. Love the changes through the day and subtle movement when swiping through lockscreens. My only issue is that I unfortunately haven't been able set it as my lockscreen on my S7 for a while now.

author: Raymond Numir
comment: Just perfect. My only suggestion is that it would be nice if u guys add a little bit of small movement like small bird flying over the sky, an airplane maybe.. stuff like that! It will be so cool and great addition. Keep up the good work!

author: Amit Kumar
comment: Amazing wallpaper app I love it than any wallpaper app on playstore the wallpapers are very good and high quality but one thing I want that give some more wallpapers there good amount of collection but I change wallpaper more than 2 time in a day so use more wallpaper so please give more wallpapers thank you ✌
please re center the palm tree island and get rid of the hammock - it looks like panties stretched between the trees.

author: Jadon Williams
comment: Awesome backgrounds and unique colors make for an awesome experience. Oh and they change color depending on the time. 6 stars

author: Alexandre Serra
comment: Bad 🐶...... Bad, not so much of a choice, but I give more two stars because they look nice

reply.author: Jenny Hanell
reply.content: So sorry you didn't like the app! Was it a bug or something else? 😐

author: Lachlan Roberts
comment: Background goes away after a while and reverts to my old one.

author: Sachit Rathi
comment: Love it. I cant seem to have an issue. Something tho, maybe have a couple new live wallpapers Thanks

author: Jorge Pérez
comment: I really liked it, I just wished it had s little bit more movement. Maybe the sun light.

author: Antonio Aguilera
comment: I like the simplicity. Would like to see Thanksgiving, Christmas, and New Year's themes. One that changes with the weather would be cool too!

author: Tommy Li
comment: I really love the minimalistic design! It's nice that it turns dark at night :)

author: onigk61
comment: Add the option to sync your wallpaper with your android watch and possibly your pc somehow. Add the option to daily randomise you wallpaper on your android watch.

author: Eévove
comment: I really love this app! I'd really love to see more wallpapers, especially mountains to be implemented!

author: Charlie Victoria Taylor
comment: Keeps crashing on my Pixel XL, very nice app if it works for anyone else though.

reply.author: Jenny Hanell
reply.content: This issue should be resolved in the latest version of the app!

author: Jonny Vaughan
comment: Just bought you a beer via the app 🍺 beautiful, lovingly crafted wallpapers and an excellent creator with a great app development philosophy.

author: Ashley Hoang
comment: I love this app, for it doesn't draining battery. The wallpapers are great. I hope they will update some more wallpapers soon.

author: Saeed Esmaelzadeh
comment: Love it so far, but i wish there was a little movement in the wallpapers...

author: MALLU STREET
comment: You should add more isles and the randomization should be fixed great app 😍😍

author: YBD
comment: This app is great and I am prepared for the day where you start to make more wallpaper apps!

reply.author: Jenny Hanell
reply.content: Thanks! Me to! I just need some more hours of the day! 😁

author: Muhid Mehedi
comment: please add option for dual sim sets, so that dual sim can have different wallpapers. thanks!

author: Hanif Shaquille Budiawan
comment: I liked this because the live wallpaper design is super good and no lags! Good job!

author: vizz vishnu
comment: Please update more designs.. please make a launcher with the same concept.. loved it.

author: Aditya Gaydhani
comment: Disappointed with the new islands
